name: Low Fat Alfredo
ingredients: 3 tbsp butter ½ tsp garlic powder
1 cup fresh parmesan chees. Grilled chicken breast and add on top. Server on pasta.
steps: In pan, mix together flour and butter. Add remaining ingredients. Cook over heat until it thickens a little
then add to your noodles. It will be a runny sauce until you add to your noodles. I also add about 1/2 c to
